title: Just a idea for a skin concept.
body:
This isn't a fully fleshed out idea but I remember looking at early design concepts for Ekko when I was just looking at his art and further understanding him since he is my favorite champion and all. Back to the ideas in my head, I remember seeing Ekko on skates which I really liked and thought would fit well on a skin for him. The aim being toward a jet set radio feel in my head something urban/Rebellious youth like. Especially because Ekko's mobile/speedy assassin feel could really work well with skates concept and visual wise.  Ideas are always welcomed Is till need to flesh out a design but it's just a idea. I feel Ekko could use a skin that actually drives people to use it academy and sandstorm don't really poke out well. {{champion:245}} Hope this baits @KateyLKhaos.


Arcade and Project are concepts I feel would work well with him as well.

*(I had to look up Jet Set radio because I forgot this was a thing.)*

Looking at the characters, I think he's got some sweet similarities to Beat. Like you've said, him on skates could be awesome, as he's a super mobile champ as is.  We'd need to some up with a weapon that works for him, both for a sword-type that he holds, and one for the canister on his back. I think it's doable, though. 

My personal vote would be for Arcade, but that's my favorite line and I'm totally bias. :x
